name: Magic Wand
description: A wand imbued with magical energy, allowing the user to cast spells.
looks: The magic wand is made of a smooth, polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings. It has a crystal at the tip that glows with magical energy when spells are cast.

special_weapon_skills.wand_skill: Allows the user to cast spells more efficiently.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast devastating fire spells.
looks: The Fireball Staff is made from polished oak wood, with a carved handle and a crystal orb at the top. The orb glows bright red when the staff is activated.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell for casting a fireball. When activated, it releases a burst of fire that damages enemies.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is made of thick parchment. It has intricate magical runes inscribed on its surface, which glow with a faint red light when activated.

special_effects.damage: Upon activation, the scroll releases a fireball that deals damage to enemies in its area of effect.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small and lightweight dagger made of silver.
looks: The silver dagger has a slender blade with a silver shine. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.dagger: Increases damage dealt with dagger attacks.

name: Sword of Valor
description: A legendary sword imbued with the essence of valor and honor
looks: The Sword of Valor is a magnificent weapon, with a long and slender blade made of shining steel. The hilt is wrapped in fine leather, adorned with intricate golden engravings.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.valor_strike: Has a chance to deal bonus damage based on the character's valor stat.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A well-crafted longsword made of steel
looks: The longsword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of polished steel with a leather grip, and the pommel is adorned with a decorative emblem.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Iron Sword
description: A heavy iron sword that is effective for slashing and stabbing.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge and a hilt made of leather wrapped around the handle. It has a crossguard to protect the hand and a pommel at the end for balance.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Allows the use of advanced sword techniques.

name: Golden Sword
description: A beautifully crafted sword made of pure gold.
looks: The Golden Sword has a large blade made of pure gold, with intricate engravings and patterns. The hilt is adorned with jewels and the grip is wrapped in fine leather.

name: Sturdy Longsword
description: A well-made longsword with a sturdy hilt and blade.
looks: The Sturdy Longsword has a polished steel blade with a slight curve and a double-edged design. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip. It has a simple crossguard and a pommel at the end.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a higher chance to critically strike.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made of steel.
looks: The Steel Gauntlets are made of polished steel with intricate etchings along the surface. They have a full hand coverage with reinforced fingers and knuckle guards.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of polished steel.
looks: The steel sword is a straight blade with a sharp edge and a pointed tip. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Allows the use of special sword techniques.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a simple design, with a straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather. It has a silver-gray color and a slightly worn appearance.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.
